2.「なにやら 中が騒がしいようだ。| 様子を見てくれ ユナティ。: There seems to be some kind of commotion|inside. Check it out, Unaty.

3.「理由を答えろと 言っているんだ！| なぜ 魔法戦士団を キズつけた！！: I want to know why! Why did you hurt the|Armamentalist Corps?

4.「ウソの取り引き情報で| 魔法戦士団を引きつけている間に あんたが| ドルワーム: While you're trying to attract Armamentalist|Corps with your false deals, you're causing a|riot in Dolworm Kingdom...

5.「そうやって 魔法戦士団の信用を落とすのが| 目的だったはずだろう！ なのに 彼: That's how you wanted to discredit the|Armamentalist Corps!　And yet you attack them!

6.「キッヒッヒ。| わしの商売をジャマするヤツは | 許さねえって そんだけのこと: Kick. I won't tolerate anyone interfering with|my business, that's all.

7.「そういうことか……。| つまり あんたの妻が魔法戦士で| 任務で死んだっていう: So you're telling me that your wife was an|armamentalist who died in the line of duty is|a lie?

8.「魔法戦士ってのは 殉職が多いからな。| そうやって同情させりゃ あんたが| 乗: Armamentalists are martyrs. I just thought if|I made you feel sorry for me like that, you'd|come on board.

9.「わしゃあ 花の独身貴族だ。キヒヒヒ。| 嫁なんかいたら この仕事はできん。: I am a flowery bachelor. Kihihihi. I can't do|this job if I had a wife.

10.「……あんたは もう 用済みだ。| ちょうど 迎えが来てるぜえ？: I'm done with you. Your ride is on its way.

11.「待ってたぜ 魔法戦士団！| 裏切り者のノーランは ここにいらぁ。| タダでいい: We've been waiting for you, Armamentalist|Corps! Here's Noran, the traitor. Take it for|free, slob!

12.「ノーランだけではない。| 貴様も連れていくぞ 魔物商人ザルギス。: Noran is not the only one. I will take you|too, Zarugisu the monster merchant.

13.「おーっとっと。そいつは困る。| 仕事が 立て込んでるからなあ。| キヒヒヒヒ…: Oh, no, no, no, no. That's a problem. I've got|a lot of work to do. Kihihihihihihihi...|adios!

14.「おのれ！ 逃げるか！？: Oi!　You want to run away?

16.「衛士ノーラン！| 貴公を 国家反逆の罪で 捕縛する！: Guard Noran! You are hereby charged with|treason!

17.「ノーラン。ザルギスのことを教えよ。| あやつは どこへ逃げた？ 居所が わかる: Noran. Tell me about Zarugisu. Where did he|run off to?　Do you know where he is?

18.「……ゴブル砂漠西。砂岩の洞くつの奥に| 魔物を集めて 取り引きの準備をしていま:
...Goble Desert West. Deep in a Sandstone|Cave, they had gathered monsters and were|preparing to make a deal. They probably fled|
|there.

19.「貴公の言うことを うのみにはできんが……。| 今は その真偽を確かめている時間: I don't believe what you say, but I don't have|time to verify it now.

20.「このまま 向かいましょう。| 衛士ノーランは 私が監視します。: Let's keep heading in. I'll keep an eye on|Guard Noran.

22.「<cs_pchero> 遅いぞ。| 魔物商人ザルギスを 追いつめたところだ。: <cs_pchero> You're late. We just caught up|with Zarugisu the monster trader.

23.「魔物商人ザルギス！ 今度こそ 逃がさぬ。| 我が王国を ゆるがさんとした悪事の:
Zarugisu the monster trader!　This time you|will not escape. I will not allow the many|evils you have wrought against my kingdom to|
|go unpunished!

24.「ちっ……。こりゃあ まずいな。| 商品の在庫が 心もとねえんだよなあ。: Damn... this is not good. We don't have enough|products in stock.

25.「だが ここで あんたらだけでも| 消しておかないと あとあと| 面倒なことに: But if we don't erase you at least here, we're|going to have trouble later.

27.「むう！ こんな大物を 隠していたか……。: Mwah!　You're hiding something this big.

28.「<cs_pchero>。いつもの作戦だ。| 貴公が 大物の相手をしている間に|: <cs_pchero>. It's the usual strategy. While|you're dealing with the big boys, we'll take|out all the small fry. Understood?

29.「キヒヒ……。作戦など 無意味よ。| 最強の名に恥じぬ パワーを味わうがいい！: Kihihihi... your strategy is pointless. You|will be the most powerful of them all!

32.「<cs_pchero> 間に合ったか！| この戦いは 負けられないのだ。| 貴: <cs_pchero> You made it in time! This battle|cannot be lost. I'll leave you to deal with|the big boys!

33.「魔法戦士ってえのは 本当に しぶてえなあ。| そんなに 最強商品と 遊びたいっ:
Armamentalists are really patient, aren't|they? If you want to play with Strong Goods so|badly, I'll give you one more round of|
|service!

35.「キヒヒ……。最強の商品が やられるとはな。| だが まだ 終わりじゃねえからよ: Kihihi... I never thought I'd see my Strongest|Goods get screwed over. But it's not over yet.

36.「まだ 魔物を隠しているのか？: Are you still hiding your monster?

38.「こいつを捕らえて 自首するつもりでした。: I was going to catch this guy and turn myself|in.

39.「私が 魔法戦士団を おとしいれたことは| まぎれもない事実です。しかし……: It is an indisputable fact that I have wronged|the Armamentalist Corps. But...

40.「魔法戦士団の壊滅を 望んだのではありません。| ただ 魔法戦士団が信用を失い|:
I did not wish for the Armamentalist Corps to|be destroyed. I only hoped that the|Armamentalist Corps would be discredited and|
|disbanded...

41.「どうして！？ ノーラン兄ちゃん！| どうして そんなことを！？: Why!　Brother Noran! Why did you do that?

43.「ノーランよ。お前が 魔法戦士を| 忌避していたことは わかっている。: Noran. I know you've always shunned|armamentalists.

44.「だが 魔法戦士団の解散を願うまでに| 至った理由は それだけではあるまい。|:
But that may not be the only reason why you|have come to the point of wishing to disband|the Armamentalist Corps. Speak. I don't care|
|if it's a long story.

46.「……私が生まれた町は | ウェナ諸島の 西のはずれに浮かぶ| 小さな島の 小さ: ...I was born in a small town on a tiny island|on the western edge of the Wena Islands.

47.「ヴェリナード王国のような 豊かな所では| ありませんでしたが 一年中| 違う花: It wasn't as rich as Verinard Kingdom, but it|was a beautiful town with different flowers|blooming all year round.

48.「私の父は 誇り高き魔法戦士で……| 父親同士が親友だった ユナティとは| 幼い:
My father was a proud armamentalist... and|I've been with Unaty ever since we were|little, as our fathers were best friends with|
|each other.

49.「そして やはり魔法戦士だった ユナティの父が| 任務の最中に 遠征地で命を落と:
And Unaty's father, who was also an|armamentalist, was killed on an expedition|during a mission when Unaty was only four|
|years old...

50.「父は 親友の娘である ユナティを引き取り| 私とユナティは 本当の兄妹になりま: My father took in my best friend's daughter,|Unaty, and we became brother and sister.

51.「子供のころ 魔法戦士として 遠い国で活躍する| 父の話を聞くのが 何よりも好き:
As a child, I loved more than anything to|listen to my father's stories of his exploits|as an armamentalist in faraway lands. To me,|
|he was truly a hero...

52.「そんな ある日…………。| あの 忌まわしい事件がおきたのです。: Then one day... that abominable incident|occurred.

53.「魔物の大群が 町中に現れ| 私とユナティは 何もできず| 家のすみで 母に抱か: A horde of monsters swept through the town,|and Unaty and I were helpless, sitting in the|corner of the house, in my mother's arms.

54.「父は 任務で遠征していて| 私たちは ただ ふるえながら| 父の助けを待つより: My father was away on a tour of duty, and we|could do nothing but shiver and wait for him|to come to our aid.

55.「そのとき 私は 心の中で何度も思いました。: At that time, I thought many times in my mind.

56.「父は 必ず 来てくれる。| 母と私とユナティを 助けるために……と。: My father will come. He will come to help my|mother, me and Unaty.

59.「私とユナティは 衛士に救われましたが | 母は 魔物に殺され……| 町も無残に: Unaty and I were saved by the guards, but my|mother was killed by a monster... and the town|disappeared without a trace.

60.「だから 私は 魔法戦士には なれなかった！ | 家族より 故郷より 任務を優先:
That's why I could never become an|armamentalist! I didn't want to be an|armamentalist who put his mission before his|
|family or his hometown!

62.「お前の その想いは 当然 わかっていた。| だが 衛士となった お前は その呪:
Of course, I knew of your desire to do so. But|now that you have become an Eishi, you should|have been freed from that spell, shouldn't|
|you?

63.「それが なぜ今になって| 魔法戦士団の解散などを目論んだのだ。: Why now would they plan to disband the|Armamentalist Corps?

65.「……怖くなったのです。| 再び 愛すべき家族を| 失ってしまうのではないかと…: I was scared. I was afraid that I would lose|my loving family again...

66.「魔法戦士は 危険すぎる。| このままでは ユナティまでも失ってしまう。| 死ん: Armamentalists are too dangerous. If we don't|do something, we will lose Unaty as well. Like|my father who died...

67.「だから 私は 思ったんです。| 魔法戦士団など なくなってしまえばいいと。|: That's why I thought. I thought that the|Armamentalist Corps should cease to exist.|Then Unaty would not have to die...

69.「魔法戦士が 遠くの地で戦うのは| このウェナ諸島を守りたいっていう| 強い想い: Armamentalists fight in faraway lands because|they have a strong desire to protect these|Wena Islands.

70.「その想いのためなら| 私は死ぬことなんて 怖くないの……。: I'm not afraid to die for that thought...

71.「母さんは 最期にオレに言った。: Mom told me at the end.

72.「お父さんは きっと今頃 遠くの場所で| 誰かを助けるために戦っている。そんな勇: Your father is probably fighting to save|someone in a faraway place right now. You are|lucky to have such a brave and kind father...

73.「……だが その言葉は| オレの心を 楽にしてはくれなかった。: But those words didn't ease my mind.

74.「……オレは 今も わからない！| 父さんも 母さんも 本当に幸せだったのか！: I still don't know! Were you and Mom really|happy?

75.「オレなら……オレなら 生きて| 愛する人を守りたい。そのためなら| どんな卑怯: If it were me... if it were me, I would live|to protect the people I love. I would do|whatever it takes to achieve that...

77.「我輩は 多くは語れぬが| あの任務は ウェナ諸島を守るため| 決して 失敗の許: I can't speak for myself, but that mission to|protect the Wena Islands was a mission that|could not be allowed to fail.

78.「だがな……。そのような 任務の中でも| 貴公の父上は 家族を忘れたりしなかった: But even in the midst of such a mission, your|father never forgot his family.

79.「……貴公の父上は 最期に| 部下であった我輩に この証を託したのだ。: Your father entrusted this testimony to me,|his subordinate, at the end of his life.

80.「貴公が 一人前の魔法戦士になったとき| 渡してほしいと 頼まれていた。| 今: He asked me to give it to you when you become|a full-fledged armamentalist. Perhaps this is|not the best time to give it to you.

82.「お父さんたちは 私とノーラン兄ちゃんが| 立派な魔法戦士になると思っていたのよ: Dad and the boys thought that my brother Noran|and I would make great armamentalists.

83.「だから 危険な任務に 命をかけることも| 恐れなかった。私たちが お父さんの願: That's why he wasn't afraid to risk his life|for a dangerous mission. He believed we would|carry on his father's wishes...

85.「……<cs_pchero>。今回の任務は 終わった。| 衛士ノーランと 魔物商: ...<cs_pchero>. This mission is over. Noran|the guard and Zarugisu the monster trader will|be taken by us to Verinard Castle.

86.「貴公も 魔法戦士団サロンへ来てくれ。| 任務 ご苦労であった！: You, too, come to Armamentalist Corps. Thank|you for your mission!

87.「その罪 まことに許しがたいが| ノーランは 魔物商人ザルギスの巧言により| 利:
It is hard to forgive Noran for his crime, but|it is also true that he was taken advantage of|by the clever words of Zarugisu, the monster|
|trader.

88.「ならば 情状酌量の余地はある。| いたずらに 優秀な衛士を失うことは| わらわ: Then there are extenuating circumstances. It|is not my intention to lose a good guard|unnecessarily.

89.「魔法戦士団 副団長ユナティよ。: Armamentalist Corps, I'm Sub Leader Unaty.

91.「ノーランとは 兄妹として育ったと聞く。| この裁き。お前に ゆだねよう。: I am told that you and Noran grew up as|brother and sister. This judgment. I leave it|to you.

94.「貴公は 魔物商人ザルギスと結託し| 魔法戦士団を 壊滅の危機に追い込んだ！: You have colluded with the monster trader|Zarugisu to bring the Armamentalist Corps to|the brink of destruction!

95.「しかし！ 魔物商人ザルギスによる巧言。 | また 不幸な過去により 父母を亡く:
But!　Clever words from Zarugisu, the monster|merchant. And his background of having lost|his mother and father due to an unfortunate|
|past, may be a cause for compassion.

96.「なにより 衛士として残した功績の大きさ。| 優秀な衛士を失うことを 避けたいと:
Above all, the great achievements he has left|behind as a guard. The Queen's words about|avoiding the loss of a good guard are indeed|
|the right decision.

99.「よって 衛士ノーランを重罪人と裁定し | 永久に罪を償わせるべく 国外追放に処: Therefore, EMT Noran is hereby adjudged a|felon and is hereby banished from this country|to pay for his crimes forever!

100.「生涯 このウェナ諸島に| 足を踏み入れることは 許さぬ！！: You are not allowed to set foot on these Wena|Islands for the rest of your life!

102.「はい。魔法戦士の誇りにかけて。: Yes, sir. With the pride of an armamentalist.

103.「衛士ノーランの処遇は決まった。| これは わらわの裁定として受け取るがいい。: The treatment of the guard Noran has been|decided. You may accept this as the ruling of|the straw.

105.「魔法戦士団は 我が左手であり| 衛士団は 我が右手であることを。: That the Armamentalist Corps is my left hand|and the Guard is my right hand.

106.「今後 このようなことは 起こらぬと| わらわは 信じている。以上だ。: I believe this will not happen again. That is|all.

107.「魔法戦士の誇り 見せてもらった。: The pride of an armamentalist. I was shown it.

109.「<pc>。貴公の活躍で| 大きな事件を 解決することができた。: <pc>. Your Excellency's work has|enabled us to solve a major case.

110.「貴公は 優れた魔法戦士となった。| 私が教えた者たちの中で もっとも| 優秀と: You have become an excellent armamentalist. I|would say the best of all those I taught.

111.「ゆえに 私は ヴェリナード王立魔法戦士団| 副団長の権限により 貴公に これを: I, therefore, by the authority of the Vice|Commander of the Royal Armamentalist Corps of|Verinard, do hereby bestow this upon you.

112.「真に優れた魔法戦士にのみ| 与えることを許された 魔法戦士の証だ。| さあ 受: Proof of WARMENT, only the truly outstanding|armamentalist is allowed to have it. Now, take|it.

113.「それに ふさわしい 報酬を用意した。| さあ 受け取ってくれ。: I have prepared a reward worthy of it. Now,|please accept it.

114.「アーベルク団長と 話したことを伝えよう。| 貴公は 本日をもって 魔法戦士団の:
Let me tell you what I have spoken with|Commander Aberuku. As of today, you are|relieved of your duties as a member of the|
|Armamentalist Corps.

115.「貴公は 魔法戦士団という| ひとつの組織に 収まる器ではない。| その目は も: You are not an armamentalist Corps member.|Your eyes see farther than that, don't they?

116.「今後 貴公は 自身の判断で行動し| 世界を守るために はたらいてほしい。| 期: From now on, I want you to act on your own|judgment and work to protect the world. We are|counting on you, armamentalist <pc>!

117.<center>ヴェリナード城 女王の間で|女王ディオーレによって|衛士ノーラン: Verinard Castle The judgment of the guard|Noran was initiated by Queen Diore in the|queen's throne...

118.「……話は わかった。| 衛士ノーランは 我が魔法戦士団を| 危機に おとしいれ: I understand your story. I understand that the|guard Noran has put my Armamentalist Corps in|danger.
